hackathon-description-text: This is Houston's annual civic hackathon. For 24 hours, we'll build projects together that make Houston a better place to live.
hackathon-eligibility: Everyone can participate. Projects must be submitted by 12:30p on May 17 in order to be considered.
hackathon-requirements:
Please include visual aids that help the judges understand your work.  This can include:
We will be using one computer, and you cannot hook up a peripheral device.  Anything you present must be accessible through the internet.
hackathon-rules: You are responsible for working out legal issues with your teammates prior to beginning work.  We are not responsible for any intellectual property disputes that arise out of your participation in the hackathon.  We encourage everyone to make their work open source.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Meet with the Mayor to discuss your hackathon project in detail.

Esri’s ArcGIS Developer Platform will help you think with maps, using them to solve problems. Build applications for Web, Mobile, and Desktop onsite or in the Cloud with ready-to-use services, APIs, and SDKs. Esri’s GIS technology is used in over 350,000 organizations worldwide to collect, manage, analyze, and develop location-based information to help solve problems and make better decisions.
